doc.title: I-to-i Vietnam
doc.plot: Join a group of volunteers from Scotland, Switzerland, Australia, UK, South Africa and the US as they spend four weeks building a home for an underprivileged couple in Vietnam. Glimpse life along the Mekong Delta and the building process with personal accounts and photographic images. Witness first-hand efforts by humanitarians and the challenges they face building from little or no experience with only the will to better an elderly couple's life.
